key.name: use-question-marks
key.description: Set to true to be able to mark squares as unknown.

key.name: use-overmine-warning
key.description: Set to true to enable warning icons when too many flags are placed.

key.name: use-number-border
key.description: Set to true to display a border around mine indication numbers.

key.name: use-newgame-confirm
key.description: When click the smiley face a confirmation messagebox will pop up. This prevents the current game session from getting lost when you click the smiley face accidentally

key.name: use-autoflag
key.description: Set to true to automatically flag squares as mined when enough squares are revealed

key.name: xsize
key.summary: Number of columns in a custom game

key.name: ysize
key.summary: Number of rows in a custom game

key.name: nmines
key.summary: The number of mines in a custom game

key.name: window-width
key.summary: Width of the window in pixels

key.name: window-height
key.summary: Height of the window in pixels

key.name: window-is-maximized
key.summary: true if the window is maximized
